name: Honey Glow Up Kit
about: What it is:A limited-edition kit with two hydrating honey favorites—plump and prep with Honey Halo Moisturizer and nourish dry lips with Honey Vanilla Lip Smoothie..Skin Type:Normal, Dry, and Combination.Skincare Concerns:Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dryness, and Dullness.Highlighted Ingredients:- Buckwheat Honey with Propolis and Royal Jelly Blend: Provides long-lasting moisture and antioxidants while soothing and hydrating..Ingredient Callouts:These products are cruelty-free..What Else You Need to Know:It’s time to glow up your hydration ritual with two clinically backed must-haves. Honey Halo Ceramide Moisturizer visibly plumps skin with moisture and strengthens your moisture barrier while Honey Vanilla Lip Smoothie smooths the look of lip lines and provides all-day moisture..This Set Contains:- 1.7 oz/ 50 mL Honey Halo Ultra-Hydrating Ceramide Moisturizer.Clinical Results:Honey Halo Ultra-Hydrating Ceramide Moisturizer: In a test, results showed:.Clean at SephoraOur commitment to offering formulas that go beyond regulatory standards to avoid controversial ingredients without sacrificing effectiveness.
ingredients: -Buckwheat Honey with Propolis and Royal Jelly Blend: Provides long-lasting moisture and antioxidants while soothing and hydrating..-Fig Fruit Extract and Osmolytes: Bind and restore moisture, leaving skin looking plump and supple..-Potent Ceramide Blend: Replenishes skin’s moisture barrier and smooths the look of micro-wrinkles...Honey Halo Ultra-Hydrating Ceramide Moisturizer: .Water/Aqua/Eau, Glycerin, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, C13-15 Alkane, Cetearyl Alcohol, Pentaerythrityl Tetraisostearate, 1,2-Hexanediol, Bis-Diglyceryl Polyacyladipate-1, Diisostearyl Malate, Xylitylglucoside, Honey Extract, Betaine, Panthenol, Hydrogenated Rapeseed Oil, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil Unsaponifiables, Ceramide Np, Propolis Extract, Royal Jelly Extract, Tocopherol, Ficus Carica (Fig) Fruit Extract, Hippophae Rhamnoides Oil, Glucose, Bisabolol, Xylitol, Anhydroxylitol, Cetearyl Glucoside, Triolein, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Arginine, Flavor (Aroma), Hydroxyacetophenone, Xanthan Gum, Glyceryl Dioleate, Sodium Dilauramidoglutamide Lysine, Sodium Phytate, Sorbitan Isostearate, Citric Acid, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate (Natural Flavor/Arome Naturel)...Honey Vanilla Lip Smoothie Vitamin C + Peptide Lip Balm: .Hydrogenated Polyisobutene Diisostearyl Malate Phytosteryl/Isostearyl/Cetyl/Stearyl/Behenyl Dimer Dilinoleate Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride Polybutene Flavor/ Aroma Mangifera Indica (Mango) Seed Butter Synthetic Wax Ethylene/Propylene/Styrene Copolymer Euphorbia Cerifera (Candelilla) Wax/ Candelilla Cera/ Cire De Candelilla Brassica Campestris/Aleurites Fordi Oil Copolymer Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter Tetrahexyldecyl Ascorbate Palmitoyl Tripeptide-1 Honey Extract/ Mel/ Extrait De Miel Propolis Extract Royal Jelly Extract Vanilla Planifolia Fruit Extract Pyrus Malus (Apple) Fruit Extract Glycerin Please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Apply to lips as needed. .-For external use only..-Pro-tip: Use together to prep and prime skin before applying makeup...Recycling Instructions:.-Recycle the aluminum cap, glass jar, and paper carton materials.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have always loved this moisturizer, I have very sensitive skin and am acne prone and it doesn’t irritate at all. I’ve used it for years and I always will! The lip balm is nice! Doesn’t last very long but it’s cute.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this moisturizer is my absolute fav, nothing compares to her <3 shes perfect in every way. the lip smoothie is super nice and smells amazing and lasts quite a while before i feel like i need more

reviews.review_title: Sensitive skin friendly great in winter
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have always loved this moisturizer. I have normal-dry skin with some patchiness and sensitivity. I just tried the lip smoothie and it’s nice too. Very silky texture, smells pleasant. The moisturizer never fails to make my skin feel soft and moisturized without being greasy and lies great under makeup (Haus Labs foundation and cocneraler).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: nothing compares to honey halo, especially in the colder months for my very dry skin. with winter approaching, my other moisturizer wasn't cutting it and left me feeling itchy and dry mid-day. my face stays hydrated all day long and looks so healthy and plump. the lip smoothie is nice too, not so much as a hydrating balm, but as a nice glossy finish. the lip smoothie is essentially a free item considering the regular jar of the moisturizer is the price of this kit, so it's worth it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cream is my holy grail. It leaves my skin feeling so nourished and glowy in the morning when I wake up. This was my was first time trying the lip smoothie and I love the texture. Its thinner than the laniege lip mask, but more moisturizing in my opinion. My lops feel so soft in the morning snd there’s always a bit of product still on y lips. The smell is also delicious, it smells a bit like bron butter cookie or something.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: All time favorite moisturizer and the lip mask is great to

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Porcelain skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: noticeable improvement when using.  skin feels hydrated.  usually am sensitive and break out from products with scents or colours.  this one doesn't  bother me at all and feels great.  lip smoothie feels amazing too
